data.description: Fluent World is a MERN stack web application.This is a Foreign Language Learning Schools WEb application.All Student can Enroll courses .Instrauctors can Publish new courses

data.name: speedy-wheels
data.description: Speedy Wheely Toy Marketplace is an online platform where users can buy and sell toys. This project aims to provide a convenient and user-friendly interface for toy enthusiasts to explore, trade, and connect with each other.

data.name: Spice-Society
data.description: Spice Society is a web application that allows users to discover chefs from Bangladesh. Spice Society: Empowered users to explore and connect with top-notch Bangladeshi chefs, revolutionizing the culinary experience.With Spice Society, you can browse a vast collection of chefs-recipes, ingredients, save your favorite recipes

data.description: This website Shows all populer  AI in details.

data.name: Campus Reserve
data.description: Campus Reserve aims to simplify resource reservation and management on college campuses. It provides a user-friendly interface for students, faculty, and staff to browse available resources, check availability, and make reservations conveniently. The application also offers administrative functionalities to manage reservations, view usage analytics, and handle user permissions.

data.name: BloodBonds Network (Team project)
data.description: Blood donation website is usually used to save the life of a comatose patient. Any person from any part of the country can take the service of this website. And any person can donate blood through this website and stand next to the injured people. This website will play a special role in reducing blood harassment for the injured person.

data.name: Knowledge-cafe
data.description: Knowledge cafe is a simple React web application.

data.name: Geometry-Genius
data.description: Geometry-Genius is a Javascript Fun Project.Geometry Formulas: Access a comprehensive library of geometric formulas and equations for various calculations. Input Forms: Enter measurements and parameters for different geometric calculations.calculate Button: Compute and display results for selected calculations.  Results Display: Clearly present calculated results with appropriate units.Unit Conversion: Convert between different measurement units.
